main event: A witness observed a glowing object in the sky traveling from the southeast to the northwest on October 15, 1966.
interesting points: The object was reported to be the size of a car and exhibited various shades of orange and yellow., It maintained a slow speed and took approximately 10 to 15 minutes to cross the sky., The object appeared to hover momentarily at times., There was no sound associated with the object's movement., The sighting was discussed with the witness's family, who were skeptical.
sighted object: a glowing object resembling a car
